titleStmt.title: Reader, the heavy hour at hand, that it should not as a thief surprize us in the night, Babylons scattering whirlwind our final or utter blow ...
titleStmt.author: Eleanor, Lady, d. 1652.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Lady Eleanor by Wing (CD-ROM edition).
Title taken from opening words of text.
Place of publication from Wing (CD-ROM edition).
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
